calloutBox.title: Trustworthy Turtles
calloutBox.subTitle: 34 months to 39 months
calloutBox.content: Our Trustworthy Turtles program has 15 children ranging from approximately 34 months to approximately 39 months old.  We have two consistent and nurturing staff caring for our preschool children daily.

mainContent.title: Program Details
mainContent.content: During their time in the Trustworthy Turtles classroom, each child is given the opportunity of learning in a preschool rich environment. This experience consists of a morning circle time with calendar and our weekly theme, learning area activities centered around art, math, and science skills, with a continued focus on Zoophonics. Children will now be introduced to the beginning stages of Handwriting Without Tears, designed to encourage and develop each child’s handwriting skills. Our Trustworthy Turtles classroom is taking one nap a day, playing outdoors twice a day, and enjoying our nutritional menu.
list: Personal cot and storage area provided
Parents provide an extra set of clothes, a cot sheet, and diapers/pull-ups
Special art and various age development projects
Weekly Bible stories and prayers before each meal
Nutritious breakfast, lunch, and snack provided

boxes.title: Ms. Emily
boxes.text: I am the middle child and have two brothers. Summer is my favorite time of year because I enjoy swimming, sunshine, and warm weather! In my free time, I enjoy reading, writing, and dabbling in my photography. I have been working with children since age 12 and it never ceases to amaze me what children can show you from their perspective.

boxes.title: Ms. Karissa - Lead Teacher
boxes.text: I grew up in Grand Rapids with 10 brothers and sisters. I went to Union High School and graduated college with an Associates Degree in Child Development. I’ve been working with children since 2014, started at Big Steps in August of 2016 and love every minute. In my free time, I enjoy skiing, swimming, traveling, and shopping.
